title: Wind Cave National Park: Cave Exploration
body: Cave Exploration         Jim Lindley Crawling Under Cratework NPS Photo  Many individuals and groups have been involved in the exploration of Wind Cave, one of the world's longest caves. The cave is still being explored with no end in sight. For more information about cave exploration explore the following web pages.  A Blowing Hole Early Exploration 1959 NSS Wind Cave Expedition Herb and Jan Conn and Dave Schnute Colorado Grotto Windy City Grotto Paha Sapa Grotto Caving Rangers Cave Management
